programme.title: She's Crafty: Just Give'r
programme.desc: Wendy shows us how to make your guy the coolest cufflinks on the block using recycled game pieces and typewriter keys. Plus luscious body scrubs and a gorgeous tray.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Kitschy Kool
programme.desc: Joined by embroidery rock star Jenny Hart, Wendy shows us stylist ways to tie the French knot and turns an old rotary phone into a hip timekeeper.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Smashingly Stylish
programme.desc: Impressionistic art; cheese plate and place settings; recycled book birdhouse.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Crafty Idol
programme.desc: Wine racks, custom dinnerware, and photo edits!

programme.title: She's Crafty: Crafty Do Over
programme.desc: A groovy use for blah bar stools. Make them into chic seating or even tables. Turn a tuna can into a trendy time piece.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Crafty Flashback
programme.desc: Wendy takes you through some craft projects of the past.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Vixen Mixen
programme.desc: In this episode, revamp old bedside tables to create this va-va voom vanity. Transform tiles into coolio coasters with exo expert, Danny Sio.

programme.title: Learn to Sew
programme.desc: Have you always wanted to learn how to Sew? Well now's your chance to have a lesson in the comfort of your own home. This easy to follow step by step programme will teach you the basics to get strated and then move on to some simple projects such as making a lined tote bag to practise what you have learnt. You will find out what equipment you'll need, larn some brilliant tips to make beautiful creations including a patchwork cushion and elasticated skirt!

programme.title: Atom Heart Cross Stitch: Learn to Cross Stitch - Episode 1
programme.desc: Jacquie teaches what cross stitch is and reviews required supplies.

programme.title: Atom Heart Cross Stitch: Learn to Cross Stitch - Episode 3
programme.desc: Jacquie reviews all of her favorite cross stitch tips and tricks.

programme.title: Atom Heart Cross Stitch: Learn to Cross Stitch - Episode 2
programme.desc: Jacquie teaches how to create a cross stitch and begin working the pattern.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Wave And Box Stitch
programme.desc: Follow along with Cheryl as she teaches how to make a wave and box stitch.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Boxed Bobble Stitch
programme.desc: Marcy demonstrates how to make the boxed bobble stitch in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Fan Cables Stitch
programme.desc: Karyn shows you how to do fan cables stitches in this Stitch Along

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Tiny Bowknot Stitches
programme.desc: Bebe shows how to do tiny bowknot stitches in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Knit Twist Lattice
programme.desc: Follow along with Cheryl as she teaches how to do a knit twist lattice pattern.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Swag Stitch
programme.desc: Karyn teaches how to make a swag stitch in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: Stitch Heaven: Interview with Dr. Anna Walden
programme.desc: Learn the secret meanings of colors with Dr. Anna Walden, PHD!

programme.title: Stitch Heaven: Laura Bryant Interview
programme.desc: Learn colorful knitting tips from our master, Laura Bryant!

programme.title: Stitch Heaven: Barbara Walker Interview
programme.desc: Renowned pattern maker, Barbara Walker, shares her story of how she fell in love with knitting and pattern making.

programme.title: Hooked for Life: Learn to Tunisian Crochet
programme.desc: Mary Beth Temple teaches the basics of Tunisian crochet.

programme.title: The Stitchery: This Rug is LACE
programme.desc: Armenian needle lace done with chunky yarn to create a full area rug

programme.title: The Stitchery: I'm Remaking My EPIC Beauty and the Beast Embroidery... but Bigger! [Part 1]
programme.desc: A walk through the beginning steps of a huge embroidery

programme.desc: An Exploration of Needle Lace Techniques

programme.desc: An Exploration of International Needle Lace Styles

programme.desc: Couching and Trellis Stitch Tutorials
